meanings.definition: In a way that relates to technology.
meanings.sent1: She quickly adapted technologically to the new software.
meanings.sent2: The company operates technologically to streamline processes.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to dance technologically, but ended up doing the robot dance.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked technologically, processing information at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was transformed technologically, with interactive whiteboards and tablets for each student.

meanings.sent1: The technologically advanced device impressed everyone at the conference.
meanings.sent2: Their business model is based on technologically innovative solutions.
meanings.sent3: The cat became a technologically savvy expert in catching virtual mice on the tablet.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a technologically wired machine, always seeking the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline was a technologically dazzling display of lights and screens.
